title: Digital Age Information Literacy Competency Enhancement Workshop (Self-Directed)

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital tool competency and experience in academic resource retrieval
context.additional_context: A course for job seekers aiming to evaluate the credibility of everyday digital information, understand social polarization, and cultivate civic consciousness.

learning_goals: Learners can systematically analyze the sources, purposes, and biases of information provided across various digital platforms.
Using fact-checking techniques, learners can identify fake news and misinformation with at least 80% accuracy.
Learners can write a logically supported position statement on socially contested topics based on information evaluation results.

resources: Social Media Data Analysis Tool Sample

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
